features.heading: Do you want to know what cryptocurrencies are and how to handle them?
features.text: BC.Wallet is a perfect choice whether you are an experienced or a first time crypto user. Here is why:

test.heading: We give test currency
test.text: Try all wallet functions without losing any money!

learn.heading: Comprehensible training course
learn.text: Step-by-step instructions explains you how to receive and send cryptocurrencies with our service.

usefull.heading: Main functions for currency managing
usefull.text: All you need in one place. It's handy!

support.heading: 24/7 customer support, clear instructions
support.text: Our telegram bot and technical support service are always ready to answer your questions.

bullets.heading: BC.Wallet advantages
bullets.text: Our wallet has all main functions for easy and simple start in cryptocurrencies. In our wallet you will find:

currencies.heading: Wide list of available currencies
currencies.text: Available currencies list is constantly updated. If you want to see any currency in our wallet, please, let us know and we will respect your wishes.

updates.heading: Our service is still new, but we want to make it as easy as it can be
updates.text: Help us in implementing our ambitious project! Receive training, write us about your experience with our service and the first 300 users will receive bitcoins for their reviews. Find the offer details in your wallet.

action.text: Want to try later? Leave your e-mail and we will send you updates on BC Wallet.
action.success: Success! We will send you most importantt news and updates!.
